lead_paragraph: Vegetable stews share the menu with less traditional dishes, like eggs and lox on injera, a crepe-like flatbread.

headline.print_headline: In Harlem, Food From Ethiopia via Israel
headline.main: At Tsion Cafe in Harlem, Food From Ethiopia via Israel

snippet: Vegetable stews share the menu with less traditional dishes, like eggs and lox on injera, a crepe-like flatbread....
abstract: Ligaya Mishan reviews Ethiopian restaurant Tsion Cafe in Harlem, NY.
